DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy Atorvastin v Simvastatin decrease LDL-C diabetic subject hypercholesterolemia end treatment phase .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy And Safety Study Of Atorvastatin Versus Simvastatin In Type 2 Diabetic Subjects With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus LDLC > 130 mg/dL Insulin therapy Clinically relevant organ disease ( creatininemia > 2mg/dL , CHF NYHA III IV )
